metadata.title: CVE-2021-40490 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A race condition was discovered in ext4_write_inline_data_end infs/ext4/inline.c in the ext4 subsystem in the Linux kernel through 5.13.13.
